<S%G5056>Finally,<s%> be <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3675>like-minded,<s%> <S%G4835>compassionate,<s%> loving as <S%G5361>brothers,<s%> <S%G2155>tenderhearted,<s%> <S%G5391>courteous,<s%>
